recipe.ingredients: - zucchini: 2 (sliced) - eggplant: 1 (sliced) - yellow bell pepper: 1 (sliced) - red onion: 1 (sliced) - cherry tomatoes: 1 cup - garlic cloves: 3 (minced) - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - balsamic vinegar: 2 tablespoons - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - dried basil: 1 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon - feta cheese (crumbled, optional): 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Preheat Oven: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). 2. Prepare Vegetables: In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced zucchini, eggplant, yellow bell pepper, red onion, and cherry tomatoes. Add the minced garlic. 3. Season and Mix: Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the vegetables. Sprinkle dried oregano, dried basil, and black pepper. Toss all the ingredients together until the vegetables are evenly coated. 4. Roast Vegetables: Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Roast in the oven for about 20-25 minutes, until the vegetables are tender and have caramelized edges. 5. Add Cheese: Remove from the oven and sprinkle crumbled feta cheese over the hot vegetables (optional). 6. Serve: Serve warm as a delightful and hearty dinner.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 18g, Dietary Fiber: 6g, Sodium: 200mg, Saturated Fat: 3g, Total Fat: 15g, Protein: 5g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 10g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 510 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Zucchini: 66 calories for 2 medium Eggplant: 55 calories for 1 medium Yellow Bell Pepper: 50 calories for 1 large Red Onion: 44 calories for 1 medium Cherry Tomatoes: 27 calories per cup Garlic: 13 calories for 3 cloves Olive Oil: 251 calories for 3 tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar: 28 calories for 2 tablespoons Feta Cheese: 99 calories per 1/4 cup - Serving People: 4
